description:
Quorum Silver Eau De Toilette - Modern Masculine Elegance

Experience the refined charm of Quorum Silver Eau De Toilette, a contemporary masterpiece designed for the confident modern man. This bestselling fragrance from Puig captures the essence of sophisticated masculinity with its perfect balance of aromatic freshness and warm depth. ðŸ’Ž

The Distinctive Character of Quorum Silver

Released as a flanker to the iconic original Quorum, Quorum Silver offers a fresher, more contemporary interpretation while maintaining the masculine DNA that made the original a classic. The silver edition combines citrus brightness with aromatic herbs and a woody foundation for a versatile scent perfect for both professional settings and evening occasions. âœ¨

Product Information
Size 100ML
Gender Men
Product Type Eau De Toilette
Concentration EDT
Brand Puig

Fragrance Profile: A Symphony of Notes

Fragrance Notes
Top Notes Bergamot, Grapefruit, Lavender, Cardamom ðŸŒ¿
Heart Notes Geranium, Nutmeg, Cedar, Violet Leaf ðŸ”¥
Base Notes Sandalwood, Vetiver, Amber, Musk ðŸ’«

Key Features of Quorum Silver EDT:

  • Long-lasting performance with 6-8 hours of projection
  • Versatile scent suitable for office wear and evening occasions
  • Modern interpretation of a classic masculine fragrance
  • Balanced composition with aromatic, woody, and fresh facets
  • Elegant silver bottle design reflecting contemporary sophistication

Crafted by Puig, a renowned fragrance house with over a century of expertise, Quorum Silver continues the legacy of the original Quorum launched in 1982. This new arrival offers a contemporary twist on a classic masculine scent, reimagined for today's sophisticated gentleman who appreciates distinctive fragrances with character.

Frequently Asked Question

How does Quorum Silver differ from the original Quorum?

While the original Quorum is known for its bold, intense character with prominent tobacco and leather notes, Quorum Silver offers a fresher, more contemporary interpretation. It maintains the masculine DNA but incorporates brighter citrus elements, aromatic herbs, and a cleaner woody base. The silver edition is more versatile and office-friendly while still projecting confidence and sophistication that made the original a classic. This makes it perfect for the modern man who appreciates heritage but seeks a fragrance suited to contemporary lifestyles. ðŸŒ¸

Elevate your presence with Quorum Silver Eau De Toilette â€“ where timeless masculinity meets modern sophistication in a woody aromatic masterpiece.
short_description: Discover Quorum Silver EDT, a sophisticated woody-aromatic fragrance for men. This modern masculine scent blends invigorating citrus, aromatic lavender, and warm woods for a versatile signature that transitions effortlessly from day to night. Perfect for the confident, contemporary gentleman.
seo_title: Quorum Silver EDT 100ML | Powerful Men's Woody Fragrance
